Sequence Information.Peptide Name: StCT2 (also named Um3; natural AMPs; scorpions, arachnids, Chelicerata, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; XXA, UCLL1c)
Sequence Information.Source: venom,Scorpiops tibetanus; ALso found inUrodacus manicatus

Literature Information.Literature: Active against M. luteus (MIC 2 uM), E. coli (15 uM), S. aureus (15 uM),  L. grayi (4 uM), L. fleischmannii (MIC 4 uM), L. monocytogenes (MIC 8 uM), including MRSA, in vitro and in animal model:mouse. Updated Jan2017.
Literature Information.Author: Cao L, Li Z, Zhang R, Wu Y, Li W, Cao Z.2012, China, Asia
Literature Information.Title: StCT2, a new antibacterial peptide characterized from the venom of the scorpion Scorpiops tibetanus.
